title: Technomancer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Enhance an authorized player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may choose to permanently increase a target's Attack or Defense by one stage or give them one permanent immunity (roleblock, redirect, etc). You cannot give them death immunity.
- Your win condition changes depending on the alignment of authorized targets. If the majority of authorized targets are Sentries, then you win with the Sentries. Otherwise, you win with the Coven.
- You may choose to lock in your win condition at any time. When you do so, you may no longer change win conditions.
- The Coven knows who you are, but not your win condition or your actions. You do not know who the Coven is or their roles. You enter their factional chat if you lock into a Coven win condition.
- You cannot promote into a Sentry (Power) role unless you have locked into a Sentry win condition. If the Sentry (Power) chooses you as their heir, the heir is randomized.
- If you lock into a Coven win condition, you may target anyone.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value: - You cannot receive the Necronomicon unless you have locked into a Coven win condition. If you do, you may permanently reduce someoneâ€™s Defense by one stage instead. If this goes below None, they die.
